item.title: Like a Yoyo
item.description: I bought a ticket. The steam liner is in dry dock. Sometimes you have a good idea. An idea that will, in the long run at least, save you time. That idea makes so much sense you can explain it to other people and they shout “Yes! I get it! You should totally build a steam liner!” But you shouldn’t. There are ways to get across the ocean. You can buy a boat.
